title: One State, One Tunnel: Recap and Fallout of an Eventful Week 9
description:
Today, hosts Wendi Nix, Desmond Howard, and Greg McElroy react to the fallout of a wide range of stories, notably the Michigan-Michigan State tunnel brawl that occurred post game and the firing of Auburn coach Bryan Harsin. In addition, the crew, with guest Heather Dinich, looks into the upcoming CFP rankings that will come out later tonight and how last weekends games could have shaken things up for the committee. In particular, could Clemson be left out, could TCU sneak above Alabama, and more. We finish the segment with guest Chris Low on Bryan Harsin's tumultuous two seasons at Auburn and what that means for both Harsin and Auburn.
